list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an official who watches a game or match closely to ensure that the rules are adhered to and (in some sports) to arbitrate on matters arising from the play.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the referee sent off two French players
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Trọng tài đã gửi hai cầu thủ Pháp

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the man who refereed the World Cup final
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Người đàn ông đã đề cập đến trận chung kết World Cup
